resources.string: In Tic Tac Toe, you will be taking the role of the \'O\' character, and the AI will be the \'X\' player. Each player takes turns selecting a square on a 3x3 grid, and the winner is the one who can align three of their own symbol in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally). Good luck! (You'll need it, since my AI is unable to lose!)
